sentences.sContent: She was still at the pinnacle of her career.
sentences.sCn: 她依然处在事业的巅峰时期。

remMethod.val: pin (针) + nacle → 山顶上长满树叶像针一样尖的pine (松树) → 山顶

trans.tranCn: 山顶； 顶点； 尖顶
trans.tranOther: If someone reaches the pinnacle of their career or the pinnacle of a particular area of life, they are at the highest point of it
